keyword: how many calories is in a fortune cookie
title: How Many Calories in a Fortune Cookie?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a fortune cookie, including carbs, protein, fat, and other nutrients based on standard size, plus tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in a Fortune Cookie?
assumptions: Standard commercial fortune cookie, approximately 10 g, crispy baked shell with paper message inside, no added fillings or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and baking method. Check packaging for exact values when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical fortune cookie contains about 30 calories and 7 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a fortune cookie?
faqs.a: Approximately 30 calories for a standard 10 g fortune cookie.

faqs.q: Are fortune cookies high in sugar?
faqs.a: They contain about 3 g of sugars per cookie, mostly from the dough.

faqs.q: Do fortune cookies have any protein?
faqs.a: Very little, around 0.5 g per cookie.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in a fortune cookie?
faqs.a: About 7 g of carbs, with no fiber.

faqs.q: How does size affect calories in fortune cookies?
faqs.a: Larger cookies can have 40-50 kcal; smaller ones around 20 kcal.
